Key Match Events: The match ended in a tie after India failed to score the required 1 run to win
Wanindu Hasaranga and Charith Asalanka each took three wickets
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to bat first
Rohit Sharma expressed confidence in the pitch conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's skipper Charith Asalanka reflected on the win
India's players expressed disappointment over the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second ODI will be played the next day at the same venue
Others: The match was tied due to India's failure to chase down the target
